name: National Health Insurance Service_Health Checkup Information
description: Health checkup information refers to the general health of employees and dependents aged 40 or older, local subscribers who are the head of household, and local subscribers aged 40 or older. Screening results and basic information (gender, age group, trial code, etc.) of 1 million people in each year who have a life transition period health checkup history that those who have reached the age of 40 and 66 among those subject to general health checkup It is open data consisting of and examination details (height, weight, total cholesterol, hemoglobin, etc.) * Each blank item is a part that has not been performed by each individual. (Wisdom teeth) Abnormal \â€ item deleted due to non-implementation * Due to the change in the hearing item answer in 2020, 1: normal, 2: suspected disease, 3: not measurable * Electronic cigarettes were not included in the smoking status. File Please refer to the "National Health Information Data Health Checkup Information User Manual" for code descriptions for each item. (Click "Past Periodic Data" > "More" at the bottom)
